#summary External Setpoint circuit for remote control of stromtreiber

= Introduction =

This circuit allows external fine tuning of the Stromtreiber circuit.  A 10V differential Voltage at the input results in a +1V addition to the internal setpoint, which is set by the potentiometer of the Stromtreiber.  When no external control is required, the differential amplifier is disconnected (with a toggle switch) and only the Internal Setpoint voltage is output.
